episode_event_ch0657_00_chusuke/4001_040:
Of course we do! We’re the two best Pokémon
cry imitators in Galar!
Yeah! We’re Poké Kid friends from Galar!
episode_event_ch0657_00_chusuke/4001_100: Nice to meet you! I’m Petey!
I’m a Poké Kid who really loves Pikachu!

Wait... Are you partners with a Pikachu,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?!

I wanna see it! Please, could you show it to me?
Pleeease?

Even with those cute movements, you can tell he’s
calm and collected underneath... It’s obvious that
he’s really strong!

If I keep observing this Pikachu, maybe I can
become EXACTLY like a Pikachu...!
episode_event_ch0657_00_chusuke/4001_030:
Wanna watch him up close for
a while?
episode_event_ch0657_00_chusuke/4001_040:
Then let’s go have a Pokémon battle! I wanna see
how he fights!
You mean I can watch him up close for a while?!
episode_event_ch0657_00_chusuke/4001_100:
Let’s be friends from now on,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
